   nacaivam /	naca evam /
   sāvayavatayā sākṣisiddhe tadasambhavāt /	sa avayava tayA sAkzi sidDe tad asamBavAt /
   kintu avibhāgaḥ parāṇutā paramāṇuśabdapravṛttinimittam /	kintu aviBAgaH parANu tA paramANu Sabda pravRtti nimittam /
   tathāca kuto vyāghāta iti /	taTA ca kutas vyAGAtaH iti /
   nanvavibhāga iti kathamidaṃ vijñāyate /	nanu aviBAgaH iti kaTam idam vijQAyate /
   sarvathā vibhāgalakṣaṇaguṇābhāva iti cenna /	sarvaTA viBAga lakzaNa guNa aBAvaH iti ced na /
   guṇāderapi paramāṇutvaprasaṅgāt /	guNa AdeH api parama aNu tva prasaFgAt /
   dravyatve satīti viśeṣaṇādadoṣa iti cenna /	dravya tve satI iti viSezaNAt adozaH iti ced na /
   asambhavāt /	asamBavAt /
   yatkiñcidvibhāgābhāvābhiprāye merumandarayorapyaṇutvaprasaṅgāt /	yat kiQcid viBAga aBAva aBiprAye meru mandarayoH api aNu tva prasaFgAt /
   avayavavibhāgābhāvo 'bhimata iti cenna /	avayava viBAga aBAvaH aBimataH iti ced na /

   paramāṇuriti vyākhyānāt /	paramANuH iti vyAKyAnAt /
   etenāvayavaparamparāvi(śrāntyabhā)śramābhāve 'navasthetyapi parāstam /	etena avayava paramparA vi(SrAnti aBA) Srama aBAve anavasTA iti api parAH tam /
   mūlakṣayābhāvasya sūcitatvāt /	mUla kzaya aBAvasya sUcita tvAt /
   yadvā vibhidyate vibhajyate iti vibhāgaḥ /	yat vA viBidyate viBajyate iti viBAgaH /
   tadabhāvaḥ paramāṇuteti /	tad aBAvaH paramANu tA iti /
   yataḥ svāvayavaṃ vinā svatantramanavayavarūpamapakṛṣṭaparimāṇaṃ	yatas sva avayavam vinA svatantram anavayava rUpam apakRzwa parimANam
   (vastu)nāsti sa paramāṇuriti yāvat /	(vastu)na asti sa paramANuH iti yAvat /
   nanvevamavayavaparamparāviśrāntyabhāve	nanu evam avayava paramparA viSrAnti aBAve
   'nantāvayavārabdhatvāviśeṣātsarṣapamahīdharayoḥ parimāṇāviśeṣaḥ syāt /	ananta avayava ArabDa tva aviSezAt sarzapa mahIDarayoH parimANa aviSezaH syAt /
   naca kāraṇasaṅkhayāviśeṣe 'pi tatparimāṇapracayaviśeṣātsarṣapamahīdharayoḥ	na ca kAraNa saFKayA viSeze api tad parimANa pracaya viSezAt sarzapa mahIDarayoH
   parimāṇaviśeṣa iti vācyam /	parimANa viSezaH iti vAcyam /
   avayavānantyasāmye tayorapyanupapatteriti /	avayava Anantya sAmye tayoH api anupapatteH iti /
   ucyate /	ucyate /
   kimayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, utānumānam /	kim ayam prasaFgaH, uta anumAnam /
   ādye hyayamarthaḥ /	Adye hi ayam arTaH /
   yadi sarṣapamahīdharāvaviśrāntāvayavaparasparau syātāṃ tadā	yadi sarzapa mahIDarO= aviSrAnta avayava parasparO syAtAm tadA
   anantāvayavārabdhau prasajyeyātāt /	ananta avayava ArabDO prasajya iyAtAt /
   tathāca samaparimāṇau bhavetāmiti /	taTA ca sama parimANO BavetAm iti /
   tatrobhayatrāpi vyāptyabhāvaḥ /	tatra uBayatra api vyApti aBAvaH /
   yadaviśrāntāvayavaparasparaṃ tadanantāvayavārabdham /	yat aviSrAnta avayava parasparam tad anantA avayava ArabDam /
   yaccaivaṃ tattulyaparimāṇamiti /	yat ca evam tad tulya parimANam iti /
   kinnāma bhavatopalabdham /	kinnAma BavatA upalabDam /
   kiñcāvayavaparamparāviśrāntyabhāva te sarve 'pi sambhūyānantāḥ syuḥ /	kiQca avayava paramparA viSrAnti aBAva te sarve api samBUya anantAH syuH /
   saṣarpamahīdharārambhakāṇāmānantyaṃ tu kutaḥ /	sazarpa mahIDara AramBakANAm Anantyam tu kutas /
   ata eva dvitīyaprasaṅgasyāpādakāsiddhiḥ /	atas eva dvitIya prasaFgasya ApAdaka asidDiH /
   etenāvayavaparamparāviśrāntyabhāve samasaṅkhayāvayavārabdhatvaṃ	etena avayava paramparA viSrAnti aBAve sama saFKayA avayava ArabDa tvam
   tataścāvayavaparimāṇādiviśeṣābhāve parimāṇāviśeṣaḥ syāditītyapi parāstam /	tatas ca avayava parimANa Adi viSeza aBAve parimANa aviSezaH syAt iti iti api parAH tam /
   vyāptyasiddheḥ /	vyApti asidDeH /
   samasaṅkhayāvayavārabdhatvāsiddheśca /	sama saFKayA avayava ArabDa tva asidDeH ca /
   dvitīye tvidamuktaṃ syāt /	dvitIye tu idam uktam syAt /
   sarṣapamahīdharau nānantāvayavārabdhau visadṛśaparimāṇatvāt /	sarzapa mahIDarO na ananta avayava ArabDO visadRSa parimANa tvAt /
   vimatau nāviśrāntāvayavaparamparau anantāvayavānārabdhatvāditi /	vimatO na aviSrAnta avayava paramparO ananta avayavAn ArabDa tvAt iti /
   ādye siddhasādhanam /	Adye sidDa sADanam /
   nahi	na hi
   sarṣapāderavayavaparamparāviśrāntyabhāvādinānantāvayavārabdhatvamaṅgīkṛtam	sarzapa AdeH avayava paramparA viSrAnti aBAva AdinA anantA avayava ArabDa tvam aFgIkRtam
   kintu sambhūtānāmanantatvam /	kintu samBUtAnAm ananta tvam /
   tadabhāvasādhane māṃ prati dṛṣṭāntābhāvaḥ /	tad aBAva sADane mAm prati dRzwAnta aBAvaH /
   guṇādau sādhanābhāvāt /	guNa AdO sADana aBAvAt /
   dvitīyasya tvaprayojakateti /	dvitIyasya tu aprayojaka tA iti /
   syādetat /	syAt etat /

   sarṣapāvayavairjagati vyāpte viśvavyāpī sarṣapaḥ syāditi	sarzapa avayavEH jagati vyApte viSva vyApI sarzapaH syAt iti
   mahīdharasyānavakāśa evetyāpādanārthaṃ iti cenna /	mahIDarasya anavakASaH eva iti ApAdana arTam iti ced na /
   pārthivaparamāṇūnāmanantatve 'pisa mūrtāntarāvakāśadarśanāt /	pArTiva parama aNUnAm ananta tve api sa mUrta antara avakASa darSanAt /
   sarṣapo yāvantaṃ deśamavaṣṭabhya vartamāno dṛśyate tāvatyevānavadhikāyā	sarzapaH yAvantam deSam avazwaBya vartamAnaH dRSyate tAvatI eva anavaDikAyA
   api tadavayavaparamparāyā avasthānācca /	api tad avayava paramparAyAH avasTAnAt ca /
   ata eva hi ākāśādīnāmapyanavadhikamaṃśaparamparāmupetya tatra	atas eva hi AkASa AdInAm api anavaDikam aMSa paramparAm upetya tatra
   parimāṇāpakarṣānantyamupapāditam /	parimANa apakarza Anantyam upapAditam /
   nanu mā bhūtsākṣātsarṣapamahīdharārambhakāṇāṃ samasaṅkhayatvam ,	nanu mA BUt sAkzAt sarzapa mahIDara AramBakANAm sama saFKayatvam ,
   tathāpyavayavaparamparāyā viśrāntyabhāve sambhūtāvayavānāṃ	taTA api avayava paramparAyAH viSrAnti aBAve samBUta avayavAnAm
   samasaṅkhayatvātparimāṇabhedo na syādi(tyucyata iti)ti cenna /	sama saFKaya tvAt parimANa BedaH na syAt i(ti ucyate iti)ti ced na /
   ānantye 'pi tāratamyasambhavāt /	Anantye api tAratamya samBavAt /
   anantā hi pārthivaparamāṇavo 'nantāścāntyaviśeṣāḥ /	anantAH hi pArTiva paramANavaH anantAH ca antya viSezAH /
   naca te samasaṅkhayāḥ /	na ca te sama saFKayAH /
   tathā satyāpyaparamāṇuṣu tadabhāvāpātāt /	taTA satyA api aparamANuzu tad aBAva ApAtAt /
   tathā sarvakalpeṣu saṃsāriṇo 'nantāḥ /	taTA sarva kalpezu saMsAriNaH anantAH /
   tathāpyapavargavaśāttāratamyamupeyameva /	taTA api apavarga vaSAt tAratamyam upeyam eva /
   evamanekamudāharaṇamiti /	evam anekam udAharaNam iti /
   yadetatsūtrakṛtā parimāṇāsamavāyikāraṇaviṣaye dūṣaṇamuktam /	yat etat sUtra kRtA parimANa asamavAyi kAraNa vizaye dUzaNam uktam /
   tadupalakṣaṇamātram /	tad upalakzaNa mAtram /

   nirṇayasya siddhāntasya /	nirNayasya sidDAntasya /
   tādṛśāścetkathaṃ nirṇayaṃ kuryurityata uktam  sunirṇītāstviti //	tAdRSAH ced kaTam nirNayam kuryuH iti atas uktam su nirNItAH tu iti //
   tādṛśārthā iti śeṣaḥ /	tAdRSa arTAH iti SezaH /
   kuta etadityata uktam  svayamiti //	kutas etat iti atas uktam svayam iti //
   svayameveti sambandhaḥ /	svayam eva iti sambanDaH /
   // iti śrīmatpūrṇapramatibhagavatpādasukṛteranuvyākhyānasya	// iti SrImat pUrNa pramati Bagavat pAda sukRteH anuvyAKyAnasya
   praguṇajayatīrthākhyayatinā /	praguNa jayatIrTa AKyayatinA /
   kṛtāyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ viṣamapadavākyārthavivṛtau dvitīye 'dhyāye	kRtAyAm wIkAyAm vizama pada vAkya arTa vivRtO dvitIye aDyAye
   'smiṃścaramacaraṇaḥ paryavasitaḥ //	asmin= carama caraNaH paryavasitaH //
   // iti śrīmannyāyasudhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //	// iti SrImat nyAya suDAyAm dvitIya aDyAyasya caturTaH pAdaH //
